name: tm66
effect: Teaches Payback to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Payback to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user stores power, then attacks.
If the user can use this attack after
the foe, its power is doubled.

flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also
make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.
